abstract: This paper is the fourth in a series of four papers aiming to describe the (almost integral) Chow ring of $\overline{\mathcal{M}}_3$, the moduli stack of stable curves of genus $3$. In this paper, we finally compute the Chow ring of $\overline{\mathcal{M}}_3$ with $\mathbb{Z}[1/6]$-coefficients.
publication_venue: The paper is the last of four papers that compose the author's PhD thesis. In particular, it contains the entire Chapter 3 of arXiv:2211.09793. Some results have been corrected and the notation has been improved. 37 pages; comments are very welcome
